What is the total number of pending aler: <pad> SELECT COUNT Pending Alerts FROM table WHERE Location = my area</s>
How many Transformers in my area have ne: <pad> SELECT COUNT Transformers FROM table WHERE Area = my area AND Alerts
How many DTs have been manufactured betw: <pad> SELECT COUNT DT FROM table WHERE Years manufactured = 1995 to 1999</s>
How many DTs are of 500kVA in my area?: <pad> SELECT COUNT DTs FROM table WHERE kW = 500kVA
How many transformers are there in my ar: <pad> SELECT COUNT Transformator FROM table WHERE Area = my area</s>
how many DTs are of Siemens make?: <pad> SELECT COUNT DT FROM table WHERE Manufacturer = Siemens</s>
How many DTs that are installed in Anna: <pad> SELECT COUNT DTs installed last year FROM table WHERE Location = Anna
What has been the average load of Fair d: <pad> SELECT AVG Last Week FROM table WHERE Apparent DT = fair deal
